Name: GraFi Easter
About the game: GraFi Easter - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, easter eggs and changing gravity. Player goal is to relocate blue coin, using only the change of gravity, on the blue rock and keep for some time to pass the level. In GraFi Easter: - Traps - Changing gravity - Cool Soundtrack - Achievements - Easter art - Treadmills - Portal's - Easter eggs - 50 levels
